title: Supply and demand
creator_credit: Ted Abenheim, Bruce Stubblefield and Greenhouse Films
brief_description: Basic introductory film on the concepts of supply and demand. Defines the law of supply and the law of demand, shows how the equilibrium point between these two laws determines prices, and provides examples of these laws in real life.
creator_credit_for_label: Ted Abenheim, Bruce Stubblefield and Greenhouse Films
